prompts: Create a powerful fire-type Pokemon with a strong, muscular build and intense flames.
Generate a quirky ice-type creature that can glide effortlessly over snowy landscapes.
Design a unique grass-type Pokemon with vibrant green colors and large leafy features.
Imagine a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sleek dolphin, perfect for ocean adventures.
Show me an electric-type Pokemon with bright yellow stripes and a lightning bolt tail.
Make a rock-type Pokemon that looks like a giant boulder with rugged edges and moss.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that can soar through the skies with colorful feathers.
